review: I purchased this unit in order to stream Amazon Prime direct to the HDTV. SUPER Easy Set-Up. The voice activation search feature works very well. I ended up returning the unit only because I decided I'd rather stream Amazon Prime via an Amazon licensed Blu-Ray/DVD Player (only a couple of models available at present) to eliminate one control unit. If you're looking to stream Amazon Prime (and the other services licenced to the device) and you want to "get it done" painlessly, this is the unit for you.
author: Peter G. Bragg

review: This device gives me instant access to Amazon Prime movies and Netflix movies! It works great! It replaces a new Sony DVD player with the same features, however the Sony unit takes forever to access the movies and loses internet access often and must be reconfigured. The Amazon Fire TV unit is instant on and accesses the movies within seconds. In addition, the Photo and Video access to Amazon Cloud allows me to display these on my TV. I do in fact love this device!
